JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are looking for warehouse workers
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
On behalf of our customers, we are looking for temps to their warehouses around Copenhagen. We have many different customers, but they need employees ASAP

We are about to enter a very busy period, where many of our customers need warehouse workers. Our customers will be needing help at their warehouses, and we are both searching for warehouse workers with and without truck license.
The shifts we can offer varies from one customer to another and the specific period. In some projects we can offer fulltime, and sometimes it's at least 2-3 shifts pr week, so it's depending on your situation too. We hope that you are flexible and can accept to work at different times of the day. Working hours can be monday to sunday in the time interval 6 am – 11 pm.

The work tasks include:
- Driving truck
- Manual work (Ad hoc)
- Assisting the truckdrivers in loading the trucks
- Picking and packing goods

It is a great advantage if you have previous experience with physically hard jobs, as you will have to walk and stand up most of your day.

We are looking for you who:
- Have previous experience with warehouse work or similar jobs
- Are dependable, stable and hardworking
- Have an eye for detail
- Speak Danish or English fluently

The shifts we can offer will be in Copenhagen, North Zealand and Vestegnen.
